alternative_title: Employers' tax and reporting for gifts to employees
body:
$!As an employer providing gifts to your employees, you have certain tax, National Insurance and reporting obligations.$!

##Businesses

There are different rules depending on the type of gift you give. Follow the reporting and payment [rules for the specific item](/expenses-benefits-a-to-z "Expenses and benefits A to Z").

##Self-employed

If you're self-employed, you don't have to report or pay tax or National Insurance on personal gifts (eg birthday or wedding presents) that you give to employees.

*[HMRC]: HM Revenue & Customs
